Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc12
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.ClientModel

Class ClientPlayer

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.Player
it.polimi.ingsw.gc12.Model.ClientModel.ClientPlayer
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ClientPlayer extends Player implements Serializable
Represents a client-side player extending the Player class. This class manages the player's state, including resources, placed cards, open corners for placing new cards, and points.
See Also:

    • ClientPlayer

      public ClientPlayer(Player player, boolean isActive, List<GenericPair<Integer,Integer>> openCorners, EnumMap<Resource,Integer> ownedResources, int playerPoints)
      Constructs a new ClientPlayer with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      player - the Player object to base this client player on
      isActive - the value of the activity status
      openCorners - the list of positions where the player can place new cards
      ownedResources - the resources currently owned by the player
      playerPoints - the points currently gained by the player
